General.Name: Fujitsu General Limited
General.Description: Fujitsu General Limited provides air conditioners worldwide. It offers split and multi split air conditioning systems; and variable refrigerant flow systems, ventilation systems, air to water systems, and air deodorizers. The company also provides fire-fighting and disaster prevention systems; and solutions for the businesses in the areas of restaurant, outpatient management, and BPO temporary staffing. In addition, it offers electronic devices, such as cameras, electronic parts, and semi-assembled components. Fujitsu General Limited was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Kawasaki, Japan.
